Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
Some teachers do not give enough feedback or the feedback is really vague eg. “elaborate further”. 
Ai gives you specific feedback, eg. “elaborate more in this point, including some examples“

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I learned more from the specific feedback from ai. It made me feel more empowered
